name: FEATHERSTONE - Demo
description:
You just returned to the Island of Featherstone, where everyone seems to be missing? As you explore the cozy island, you discover some magical items, a rock glove, a flute of wind, speedy potion? well, these items have a dual purpose, both restorative and destructive. What could they mean? 

Anyway, I only got the Rock glove in, and the game is mostly chill about exploration. You collect coins, and have to look for the rock glove in a crate somewhere, then I will leave the rest to you... Walk with Wads, move camera with Mouse, Press E to interact with stuff.

NOTE - this is a demo proof of concept that I plan to work on in the future. Its a prototype made for GGJ2022
